text: Dusri taraf jab khuda tars logon se pucha jata hai ke yeh kya cheez hai jo tumhare Rubb ki taraf se nazil hui hai, to woh jawab dete hain ke “behtareen cheez utari hai”. Is tarah ke neikukar logon ke liye is duniya mein bhi bhalayi hai aur aakhirat ka ghar to zaroor hi unke haqq mein behtar hai. Bada accha ghar hai muttaqiyon (Allah se darne walon) ka
